title: Monster Truck Madness 2 - PC
description:
Just unzip and run setup.exe

IF YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS INSTALLING ON VISTA READ THIS:

"I got it to install properly, just explore the file and find the setup.exe file, then right click it, and choose "Properties". Go the compatibility tab, and choose "Run this program in compatibility mode for" and select "Windows XP Service Pack 2" and hit ok.

It should install now, and when it finishes, right click the desktop icon, and do the same thing."
